Urusov Gambit

Mar 24, 2025

The Urusov Gambit is an aggressive line in the Bishop’s opening that starts with the moves:

  1. e4 e5
  2. Bc4 Nf6
  3. d4 Instead of playing the normal Nc3 or Nf3, white looks to add pressure to the center of the board with d4 and open up more lanes for white’s remaining pieces to get involved into the attack. Black has two responses. Black taking on e4 with his knight is definitely a worse move. White can play dxe5 and then start to attack the knight on e4.
